customErrorMessages.errorMessage: Cannot approve application without action plan/verification checks being completed.

rules.name: Yes_Has_Contact
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ( (3 AND 4 ) OR ( ( 5 OR 6 ) AND 7) )
rules.label: Yes

formulas.name: ActionPlanTemplateName
formulas.expression: IF( {!Accepted}, {!$Record.LicenseType.Name}&' - '&TEXT({!$Record.ApplicationType})&' - Admin Staff Tasks', IF( {!In_Review}, {!$Record.LicenseType.Name}&' - '&TEXT({!$Record.ApplicationType})&' - Certification Specialist Tasks', ''))

formulas.name: EmailUniqueName
formulas.expression:
IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, 'Approved') && ISPICKVAL({!$Record.ApplicationType}, 'Initial Licensure'), LEFT($Record.LicenseType.RegulatoryAuthCode, 3) & '_New_Approval_Email',
IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, 'Approved') && ISPICKVAL({!$Record.ApplicationType}, 'Renewal Licensure'), LEFT($Record.LicenseType.RegulatoryAuthCode, 3) & '_Renewal_Approval_Email',
IF( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Status}, 'Denied'), LEFT($Record.LicenseType.RegulatoryAuthCode, 3) & '_Denial_Email', '' ) ) )

formulas.name: LicenseExpiryDate
formulas.expression: IF(OR(TEXT({!$Record.LicenseType.Expiration_Type__c}) == 'Static (Even Numbered Years)', TEXT({!$Record.LicenseType.Expiration_Type__c}) == 'Static (Odd Numbered Years)'), {!$Record.LicenseType.Next_Expiration__c}, IF(TEXT({!$Record.LicenseType.Expiration_Type__c}) == 'No Expiration', Null, CASE({!$Record.LicenseType.DurationType}, 'Month', ADDMONTHS(IF({!Initial_License} == true, {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}, {!$Record.LicensePermitName.PeriodEnd}), VALUE({!$Record.LicenseType.ProcessingDuration})), {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime})))

formulas.name: NotificationBody
formulas.expression: 'You application number ' + {!$Record.Name} + ' has been updated to ' + TEXT({!$Record.Status}) + '.'

formulas.name: SubApplicationLink
UsrNickname
formulas.expression: LEFT(LEFT({!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}, FIND('@', {!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}) - 1) + RIGHT(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}), '-', ''), ':', ''), 'Z', ''), ' ', ''), 6) + '@' + MID({!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}, FIND('@', {!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}) + 1, LEN({!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}))+ IF({!Yes_Is_Sandbox}, '.azsc.sandbox', '.azsc'), 20) + ''+ RIGHT(LEFT({!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}, FIND('@', {!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}) - 1) + RIGHT(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT({!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}), '-', ''), ':', ''), 'Z', ''), ' ', ''), 6) + '@' + MID({!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}, FIND('@', {!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}) + 1, LEN({!For_Every_Participant.Email_Address__c}))+ IF({!Yes_Is_Sandbox}, '.azsc.sandbox', '.azsc'), 20)

textTemplates.name: SubApplicationEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!For_Every_Participant.Full_Name_Read_Only__c},


You have been identified as a/an {!For_Every_Participant.Role__c} for a proposed ABS - {!$Record.Account.Name}. To proceed with your application, please follow these steps:


  1. Complete the Arizona ABS application form.
  2. Gather and attach all required supporting documents.
  3. Access the application here: {!SubApplicationLink}.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please reach out to absprogram@courts.az.gov.


Important: Your application will not be considered complete until all required materials are submitted. Please complete the process as soon as possible.


Sincerely,

Certification and Licensing Division

Arizona Supreme Courts,

1501 W. Washington St.,

Ste 104 Phoenix, AZ 85007

textTemplates.name: SubApplicationSenderSubject
textTemplates.text: Complete Your Arizona Alternative Business Structures Application Today - {!For_Every_Participant.Role__c}

textTemplates.name: SubmissionEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
A new ABS Application was submitted by {!$Record.Account.Name} on {!$Record.CreatedDate}. Please click on the related link to review the details.


Application link: {!ABSApplicationLink}

textTemplates.name: SubmissionEmailSubject
textTemplates.text: A new ABS Application was submitted
